text: Gleisson Jorge de Souza Freire or simply Gleisson Freire (born May 3, 1982 in Rio de Janeiro), is a Brazilian forward. He currently plays for Brazil team Rio Negro. . ==External links== * The database of player in ogol.com.br * The database of player in footballdatabase.eu * The database of player in theplayersagent.com * A dialogue with the player and video to score two goals in the Malaysian league Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Salamanca F.C. footballers Category:Mesquita Futebol Clube players Category:Duque de Caxias Futebol Clube players Category:Al-Mina'a SC players Category:Ascenso MX players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série C players Category:Iraqi Premier League players Category:Expatriate footballers in Mexico Category:Expatriate footballers in Iraq Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Mexico Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Iraq Category:Sportspeople from Rio de Janeiro (city)
title: Gleisson Freire
